name: Adam (ʿAlayhi as-Salām)
story: First human created by Allah. Taught the names and lived in Paradise before being sent to Earth.

name: Nuh (Noah) (ʿAlayhi as-Salām)
story: Was patient with his people for many years, called them to worship Allah, built the Ark by Allah's command.

name: Ibrahim (Abraham) (ʿAlayhi as-Salām)
story: Known for his strong faith and willingness to submit to Allah, rebuilt the Kaʿbah with his son Isma'il.
